tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Very happy with every time we have been to the clinic. Dr.Salem is our family dentist. He has treated my mom's root canal and done my aunts dental implants too. I would recommend him for all ages. Super friendly and respectful towards his patients. Best wishes to the Dr.Salem and team.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: My mother went for the process of complete denture which required multiple extractions, root canal, healing time, temporary and permanent denture, etc and  and I couldn't be more pleased with the experience. Dr. Salem provided a range of budget-friendly alternative options and explained everything clearly. He was incredibly friendly and patient, making my mother feel comfortable throughout the entire process. I was impressed with the quality of his work along with his team ( Dr Nidhi and Dr Sanket).  Thank you so much for the wonderful experience!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review: ** ***** ** ********** *** ***** He is so patient with all his patients and I was very happy to see him give special preference to the elders so that they do not have to wait. I find it very endearing that he gives respect to elders and make them comfortable and special. I absolutely hated dentists and have paranoia of root canals. I had 12 cavities (but luckily no root canal) and he has made me feel very comfortable and removed the paranoia. I am due to remove my wisdom tooth which I had refused to unless it troubled me and now I am actually going to get it extracted despite it not troubling me. Totally recommend him. Thank u Dr Salem.
reply_text: Thank you for your kind words

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: This was my first experience with him n I must say it was very nice, positive,I felt comfortable at the very go n of course he explained my  line of treatment very well. I am happy I went to him n looking forward to start with the procedure.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr. Salim is not only patient and polite but has an innate quality of warmth towards his patients which is especially valuable for dentistry where often patients are faced with painful treatments. He took time to ensure I was clear on exactly what the problem was and assesses pain level often throughout to ensure it is as comfortable as possible with no surprises. It's simply not about money with him. It's about maintaining healthy teeth and healthy relationships with his patients. I've been going to him for a few years now and my positive experience hasn't changed. I refer my family and friends even acquaintances often to him and I have yet to receive a single complaint. Overall,  always a reliable and pleasant experience with a good outcome.
reply_text: Thank you so much for your kind words!
